title: MediationZone Command Line Tool mzsh - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
text: The Command Line Tool mzsh is a shell that can be used both as a system administration tool and as a Platform client. The mzsh enables you to access different parts of the system depending on if the platform is running or not, or if you are logged in or not.
